title: RoboTranslator Config Schema
description: For more information about what every parameter does, feel free to read the docs.

scanDevices.description: Lets the user force a new Bluetooth device scan. Devices selected during the discover process will overwrite the ones already present.

devices.description: List of all devices that RoboTranslator tries to connect to. Every device is described in its own object.

sensors.description: List of all sensors the device has. Every sensor is descriibed in its own object.

name.description: Name of the sensor, used only as a label

id.description: Single character that identifies the sensor. It must match the one that has been set in the microcontroller's code.

min.description: Minimum value the sensor is able to send (inclusive)

max.description: Maximum value the sensor is able to send (inclusive)

actuators.description: List of all actuators the device has. Every actuator is descriibed in its own object.

name.description: Name of the actuator, used only as a label

id.description: Single character that identifies the actuator. It must match the one that has been set in the microcontroller's code.

min.description: Minimum value the actuator is able to receive (inclusive)

max.description: Maximum value the actuator is able to receive (inclusive)

scanDuration.description: Sets the Bluetooth scan duration (in seconds).

dataRefresh.description: Sets the data refresh interval (in seconds), a.k.a. the minimum time between data requests sent to a device.

configRefresh.description: Sets the config refresh interval (in seconds), a.k.a. the minimum time between checks done by the config watcher.

timeout.description: Sets the maximum wait time (in seconds) after a data request has been sent to a device.
